alert.note: Alert for Campbell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Virginia, including the following county, Campbell. * WHEN...Until 815 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. The Falling River near Naruna at 17.42 feet and out of its banks. The river should crest this afternoon and fall this evening into tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 203 PM EDT, Runoff from thunderstorms with heavy rains Saturday is resulting in Flooding in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Brookneal and Hat Creek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
